daemonpy.file_process_id module¶

Info

Defines class FileProcessId with attribute(s) and method(s). Creates an API for the file process id context management.

class daemonpy.file_process_id.FileProcessId(pid_path: str | None, pid_mode: str | None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Defines class FileProcessId with attribute(s) and method(s). Creates an API for the file process id context management.

It defines:

attributes:
_PKG_VERBOSE - Console text indicator for process-phase.
_MODE - Supported modes for process id file.
_pid_path - PID file path.
_pid_mode - PID file mode.
_pid - PID file object.
methods:
__init__ - Initials FileProcessId constructor.
__enter__ - Opens PID file.
__exit__ - Closes PID file.
_MODE: List[str] = ['w+', 'r']¶
_PKG_VERBOSE: str = 'DAEMONPY::FILE_PROCESS_ID'¶
